item.title: Lebanon's first responders say Israeli strikes target them as they work to save lives
item.description: More than 200 emergency and medical workers have been killed since last October, Lebanon's health ministry says. Many believe Israel's military is targeting them in its war against Hezbollah.

item.title: The Consequences of Refusing to Serve in Israel's Military
item.description:
Israel has mandatory military services for citizens over the age of eighteen that meet certain requirements, and refusing to serve, which has always been controversial is even more contentious now that the country is fighting in Gaza and Lebanon. We meet one young person choosing to go to jail rather than serve in the military.
